EmailTemplate.description: REMEMBER TO FILL IN DATE & TIME! Use to confirm the planned date & time of an in-person meeting.
EmailTemplate.name: RSM: Comm of MA - Meeting Confirmation (In-Person Mtg)
EmailTemplate.subject: Meeting Confirmation - Commonwealth of MA Fleet Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks again for your interest in the Commonwealth of MA Fleet Fueling Program.
I'm emailing to confirm our scheduled meeting on <date> at <time>. I look forward to talking with you about your fleet fueling and management needs, and how the Commonwealth's Fleet Fueling Program can help. I think you'll find the Program an ideal fit for your business.
If you have any questions before our meeting, please to do not hesitate to call. Otherwise I'll plan to see you soon.
Many thanks,
Toni Clemens Regional Sales Manager – New England and New York Gulf Fleet Card Program ▪ WEX Inc. Hartford, CT Office/Cell: (203) 233-0349 Fax: (207) 791-1618 Email: toni.clemens@wexinc.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: "This message contains confidential information of WEX Inc. It is intended only for the use of the designated recipient(s) stated above and further distribution of the information is prohibited. If you have received this message in error, please notify sender immediately by telephone or reply by e-mail and delete the entire message and any attachments."
Gulf Fleet Card Services, 97 Darling Avenue, South Portland, ME 04106
